results.text: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It does not dishonor others, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.
results.reason: Describes the characteristics and actions of genuine love.
results.reflection: True love is selfless, patient, and enduring.

results.text: My command is this: Love each other as I have loved you.
results.reason: Jesus instructs us to love one another as He loves us.
results.reflection: Our love for others should mirror the sacrificial love of Christ.

results.text: Dear friends, let us love one another, for love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God.
results.reason: Love originates from God, and loving others is a sign of knowing God.
results.reflection: Love is a reflection of our relationship with God.

results.text: Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love.
results.reason: Encourages humility, gentleness, patience, and tolerance in love.
results.reflection: Love requires humility, gentleness, and patience in relationships.

results.text: Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.
results.reason: Highlights the power of love to forgive and overlook faults.
results.reflection: Love has the ability to forgive and heal relationships.
